description: While combing through the most recent Hillary Clinton e-mail dump, a certain, seemingly non-political, but potentially highly controversial message stands out. The email was sent to both Jake Sullivan, one of her top advisers, and Richer R. Verma, the former assistant secretary of state for legislative affairs. And it is brief. The body of the email […]
title: The story behind the funniest e-mail Hillary Clinton has ever sent
